content: The ig-pub generated page-template-library folder is causing a ton of bad links to image files. This is a new and yet to be documented feature. What is it and what is it good for? I am assuming the bad links are because it is assuming the assets folders sits at the root. Mine are all pages subfolders.
I'm not familiar with this feature, and found no hits on it in the source?
OK never mind ... it turns out to be a local folder that got copied to output. Did not expect that behavior but easy to fix
